title: 35: No Such Thing As A Good Sloth Onesie
content: In a special live episode for the Chortle Comedy Book Festival, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss the invention of sarcasm, the Antarctic Fire Department, dogs disguised as lions, and a Ming dynasty astronaut.
contentSnippet: In a special live episode for the Chortle Comedy Book Festival, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss the invention of sarcasm, the Antarctic Fire Department, dogs disguised as lions, and a Ming dynasty astronaut.
